about.title: About Me
about.content:
I studied Applied Information Science at PXL University College and currently work as a full-stack .NET developer, with a strong preference for frontend development. I'm always looking to grow as a developer, and I have a special interest in topics like DevOps and software architecture.

Something I truly enjoy is mentoring. Whether I'm supporting colleagues or guiding interns, I find it rewarding to share knowledge and help others develop their skills.

In my free time, I like playing video games and going camping. When I'm outdoors, I really enjoy kayaking, it's a great way to relax and enjoy nature.
